runkoserver.service

Class AreaService

  • java.lang.Object
    • runkoserver.service.AreaService

  • @Service
public class AreaService
extends Object
    Class for repository-interactions of Areas.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      AreaService()

      Deletes all Areas from the repository.

      Deletes an Area if the currently logged in user is the owner of the Area.

      • saveArea

        public boolean saveArea(Area area)
        Saves an Area to the database.
        Parameters:
        area - the Area to be saved
        Returns:
        true if Area was successfully saved, false otherwise

      • findAllAreas

        public List<Area> findAllAreas()

      • findAllPublicAreas

        public List<Area> findAllPublicAreas()

      • findAreaById

        public Area findAreaById(Long id)

      • findAreaByName

        public Area findAreaByName(String name)

      • createArea

        public Area createArea(String name,
                       Person person,
                       Boolean visibility)
        Creates a new area. Does NOT save the area to repository.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the area
        person - owner of the area
        visibility - is area visible for unauthenticated visitors
        Returns:
        created Area

      • updateArea

        public boolean updateArea(Long areaId,
                          String name,
                          boolean visibility,
                          Person whoIsLogged)
        Updates an Area's attributes if the currently logged in user is the owner of the Area.
        Parameters:
        areaId - which area will be updated
        name - areas new name
        visibility - areas new visibility
        whoIsLogged - to check who is logged in
        Returns:
        true if update was successful, false if not

      • deleteArea

        public boolean deleteArea(Long areaid,
                          Person whoIsLoggedIn)
        Deletes an Area if the currently logged in user is the owner of the Area.
        Parameters:
        areaid - which area will be deleted
        whoIsLoggedIn - to check who is logged in
        Returns:
        true if deletion was successful, false if not

      • findListedAreasById

        public List<Area> findListedAreasById(List<Long> areaIds)
        Finds all areas by id from the given list by their id and returns them as Area-objects. Used by CreateSimpleContent-method
        Parameters:
        areaIds - list of Area ids
        Returns:
        list of Area-objects

      • saveContentToAreas

        public void saveContentToAreas(Element element)
        Goes through the list of areas that an element has a database connection to, and makes sure the areas also have a connection to the element.
        Parameters:
        element - the element that connections will be checked on

      • deleteElementFromAreas

        public void deleteElementFromAreas(Element element)
        Goes through the list of areas that an element has a database connection to, and removes any connections from the areas to the element -- but not from the element to the areas.
        Parameters:
        element - on which connections will be removed

      • deleteAllAreas

        public boolean deleteAllAreas()
        Deletes all Areas from the repository.
        Returns:
        true if Area repository is now empty, false if not

      • findAreasByOwner

        public List<Area> findAreasByOwner(Person person)
        Returns a list of the Areas that a Person owns.
        Parameters:
        person - whose areas will be found
        Returns:
        list of Areas

      • addSubcriptions

        public void addSubcriptions(Person person,
                            Area area)
        Adds a new Area subscriptions for a Person.
        Parameters:
        person - person to whom subscription will be added
        area - which area will be subscribed

      • deleteSubcriptions

        public void deleteSubcriptions(Person person,
                               Area area)
        Deletes an Area subscription from a Person.
        Parameters:
        person - person whose subscription will be deleted
        area - which area will be un-subscribed

      • createListOfSubscribedContents

        public List<Content> createListOfSubscribedContents(Person person)
        Goes through all the Areas a user has subscribed to and creates a list of contents published in those areas, ordered by their modification times.
        Parameters:
        person - the person whose subscriptions will be used
        Returns:
        list of the content in chronological order

      • isPublic

        public boolean isPublic(Area area)
